## Question / Decision to Make
Describe the uncertainty or choice that needs research.

## Success Criteria
- What deliverable is expected?
- Which agents will consume the findings?

## Checklist
- [ ] Scout documented findings in `/docs/research.md`
- [ ] Citations include URLs and version notes
- [ ] Recommendation + rollback path shared with Vector

## Notes
List tools used (Docfork, Search) and any blockers or follow-up tasks.
